alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 23 at 3:51AM MDT until September 23 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility below one quarter of a mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce, Dixie, Elk City, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, and Greer Grade. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
